content:
Organize this:
"From Richelle: They both can speak more specifically about where they could use help from an agency like yours.

Thought starters may include:

Specialized messaging for our Google Ads
Content creation for LI or other social channels
6sense and how we may be able to use for account based growth"
only 3 sales people on team
used to have demand gen specialist
50 client services folks, a number of those do sell ( to current clients primarily)
outsource demand to spear vs hire internally
has pr contractor that does content for blog
has seo contractor with web stuff
does ppc as well^^^ room for improvement
demand gen audit and roadmap would be helpful
has number of lists in system

been learning a lot about mid market over last year
more industry approach this year -- focus on Insurance vertical 0-- 300 target accounts
ONLY insurance
been horizontal approach historically
has referenceable clients in insurance space
case study for insurance NEEDED likely
send case studies / references
drift implementation? - option for hours
built first 4 playbooks in drift already, working with drift team

3/2/22 - Robin & Jon connect
Sami left unexpectedly a couple months ago
they've been reconfiguring budget
"I think we're close"
just had a couple changes she says
rather than just insurance
lost BD rep too, only 2 left
40 accts they want to focus on, half are INS, half are other industries
6 MONTH TEST WITH SPEAR
month 1 strategy, get v1 pilot in market in months 2 & 3, build on it/optimize from there; show sales is booking meetings within 6 months
she is going to formally recommend moving forward, needs Richelle's approval

"I would be interested to know what/how you would approach our discussion based on knowing the following:

 

I. Sales: Two target audiences:

Middle market ($550M in revenue +)
ABM and Enterprise market (2B+)
 

We have a particular interest in Insurance and Telecom as sectors for focus, but we are open to auto, finance, pharma, manufacturing, hospitality, healthcare retail and tech. (No education, government, non-profit).

 

II. Website – Wordpress with current Drift implementation in process

III. Products and Services – we have a variety (which is great at times but also confusing). Do we choose one or two?

IV. Marketing Tools – Netsuite, Sharpspring, Responsys, Zoominfo, Social, SEO, Content, and grass roots"

11/29/22 - Jon and Robin reconnect
Hi Jon—It’s been a long time. Hope you are doing well. A lot has changed at One10 and we are now in a great place to work with a Demand Gen Agency. Do you have some time to catch up the week after Thanksgiving? Thanks.
Tech on website now showing: HubSpot, Sharpspring, Mailmunch, Wordpress, Drift
Content is need
just finishing implementing HubSpot.....sunsetting Sharpspring
Richelle is CRO now - leading marketing and sales/CS now
has marketing and sales hub for hubspot
Beginning implementation of 6sense with all the intent data too
3rd thing - evaluating uberflip, folloze, RockContent (has services too)
MISSING CONTENT WITH SMALL MKTG TEAM
content strategy for CX platforms, content creation
net new content creation a lot
historic content creation hasnt been for demand gen, moreso for sales enablement
abby helped implement hubspot
may need nurture support, not sure
Robin, Abby, Usra, those are their whole team
they sound excited about all new platforms
wants to decide by end of year
has use it or lose it by end of yr....and has next yr budget for agnecy too
$50k-$60k for this year
2023 agency for next yr - $100k with some flexibility
decision this week or next on content experience platform
CONTENT STRATEGY (audit?, 6sense, CX platform....go through content do content gap analysis,, content map, journey mapping
has started high level buyer journey with content alignemnt + gaps....7-8 months ago
other big initiative - upsell initatives for current client base...sell I&R services....BDRs reaching into multi million dollar accounts
who are potential other buyers within existing accounts, what do we say to them, messaging
has 3rd party SEO contractor.... may have interest in our services for that
wants examples of SEO what they get for month
current SEO budget is pretty insignfiicatn....frees up some money
